lines: To fly higher than any other is Ehcatl Nine's dream. But before we can fly, make wings, we must! Squawk!
This place, Ehcatl, is place for building dreams. Big dreams, Ehcatl Nine dream!
But dreams alone do not give us wings. And so wings, we build. Wings to fly higher than any other! Squawwwk!
Steal Ixali young, featherless neuker would!? Fly away in airship, flaunt wings we have not? Pay, neuker will, and pay in blood! Squawk! Squawwwk!
Squawwwk! True ally to Ehcatl Nine, you are. Cover you with feathers and change our name to Ehcatl Ten, Sezul would! Squawwwk!
...But already more than nine, Ehcatl Nine are. Changing name would only add to confusion. And so Ehcatl Nine we stay. Squawk!

よろしくハーストミル
